<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_ebh_bill_report_revenueopportunityreport</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SumAOAs</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	
	var a = parseInt(current.competitor_a_aoas);
	var b = parseInt(current.competitor_b_aoas);
	var c = parseInt(current.competitor_c_aoas);
	var d = parseInt(current.competitor_e_aoas);
	var e = parseInt(current.competitor_e_aoas);
	
	var k = a + b + c + d + e;
	current.total_aoas = k;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Mailia.Bachleitner@employbridge.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-04-24 15:58:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6086815b47566150265ad698436d43b4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SumAOAs</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Bill Report" source="x_ebh_bill_report">0f62c51ac316e91011971d4ce0013178</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Bill Report">0f62c51ac316e91011971d4ce0013178</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6086815b47566150265ad698436d43b4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Mailia.Bachleitner@employbridge.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-24 16:13:30</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6086815b47566150265ad698436d43b4"/></record_update>
